version_description:
Squashed another crash bug.

If you like Square Aspect, please take the time to give us a nice review: it really helps.

- New "Mom" Stickers - Happy Mother's Day all the Mom's out there!
- Added 22 new fonts!

If you like Square Aspect, please take the time to give us a nice review: it really helps.

◉ All new sticker picker!
◉ Updated Free sticker set!
◉ Improved Instagram share quality!

◉ NEW ICON!!! Sorry for shouting but I'm really excited about this release!
◉ Support for VIDEO! A lot of you have been asking for it and here it is!
◉ Heaps of new filters!
◉ More modern UI. I hope you like it as much as I do.
◉ Lots of small improvements and bug fixes.

I'm really keen to hear everyone's feedback on this release. Please do a review and tell me what you like or what you don't. How else will I learn? :)

◉ iPhone 6 and 6 Plus support!
◉ Merged "Fit" and "Fill" into one "Size" control
◉ Added a "Presets" control. Give it a few taps and see what you think :)
◉ Added a crop control
◉ Removed the rotate control. Now when you rotate your image it snaps to 45 degree angles for easy alignment
◉ Removed the center control. Your image and stamps/text now snap to the center as you move them near to it
◉ Moved the flip control down to the right end of the control bar
◉ Moved the filters to be closer to the front of the bar
◉ All new share screen
◉ Other minor improvements...

If you think any of this is awesome or maybe some bits need work, let me know :) I read all the reviews I get and each one really helps. Please note however, if you have an issue you should email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com so that I can help you resolve it.

Thanks :)

◉ New name, we are now Square Fit!
◉ Fixed bug in vertical centering where the alignment indicator was shown at the wrong time.
◉ Fixed bug with text where selecting text left you with no option to edit it.
◉ Saved hash tags can't be applied to your Instagram posts automatically and are added to the clipboard instead.

I've got lots more planned. If you want to get your favourite new feature included into the app let me know about it in a review!

If you have any problems with the app drop me an email at support@honkhonkpunch.com and I'll be only too happy to help get it sorted out for you.

◉ Blur background behind a video now animates when video plays (Just select a video and choose the first preset)
◉ New stickers
◉ Fixed some crashes

◉ New Birthday sticker set
◉ New Emoji sticker set
◉ Minor Bug fixes and improvements

If you notice something wrong or have any feedback please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

As always reviews are important and really appreciated so if you can spare some time it would be great if you could leave one.

◉ Support up to 60 second videos (on newer devices)
◉ You can now adjust the strength of the filters
◉ Added over 20 new shapes
◉ New frames
◉ Minor interface improvements

Reviews are important and really appreciated so if you can spare some time it would be great if you could leave one.

If you have any problems or suggestions please email me at: support@honkhonkpunch.com

◉ Added 2 new background patterns
◉ Added 2 new oval shapes
◉ Improved video saving so the saved video color better matches the preview
◉ Fix a bug where adjusting filter strength cleared the selected pattern
◉ Fix a bug causing saving a video to sometimes crash on iOS 10
◉ Various other bug fixes and enhancements

There are a bunch of changes under the hood now that iOS 10 is out.

If you notice any problems please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

◉ Fix a crash that could occur when switching colors

Please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com if you are experiencing any issues.

◉ Added 9 new fonts
◉ Fix bug where filter adjustments were not visible in preview on iOS 10
◉ You can now change filters while the video is playing
◉ Minor UI enhancements

Please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com if you are experiencing any issues.

• Added a new Font and fonts now sorted alphabetically
• Fixed a bug with Facebook sharing
• Add some new background patterns
• You can now rotate and flip the shapes
• Some UI improvements

Please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com if you are experiencing any issues.

• Add back some fonts that got removed in the last update

Please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com if you are experiencing any issues.

• New Canvas control to change the shape of your project - not just square any more :)
• Moved filters from the image editor to the main filters section
• Auto save your images and videos when you go to the save screen
• Added support for 25 minute videos on newer devices
• You can now cancel a video save
• Halved the save size for videos
• iPhone X updates

Please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com if you are experiencing any issues.

• Improvement to new Draw control
• Minor bug fixes

• Higher resolution saves for non square videos:
• up to 1920x1080 on iPhone 6s or newer and iPad air 2 or newer
• up to 1280x720 on iPhone 5, 5s, and 6 and iPad 3, air 1
• Improved the quality of some of the filters
• Some older devices can now do 5 minute videos

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Make your own stickers
• Look for the clip option at the far right of the scrolling tab bar
• Minor bug fixes

If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• New "Draw" control for doodling on your creation
• Minor bug fixes

• Improvement to new Draw control
• Minor bug fixes

• Added a bunch of premium fonts
• Fixed issue where you could get a rectangle around your saved content
• Fixed issue with rendering of saved negative offset shadow

If you have any issues or suggestions let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com
